title: (Item concept) Hut construction kit.
body:
A small wooden hut that can be built by the player. 

It is a consumable item, about 700 gold.

The hut is about twice the size of a normal champion. It is placed by clicking on a spot on the ground, and makes the champion spend 4 seconds channeling to construct it. When it is placed, any ally can click on it to enter. 2 players can fit inside. The hut has three windows and a door. When inside, mouse movement will grant vision out of one of the three windows, in a cone for about 1500 range. 

The hut has 400-1800 hp (based on level) and takes half damage from ranged attacks. 

If the champion is ranged, they can auto-attack, or cast spells through the windows at their normal range.

Any champion inside the hut is invulnerable.
